description: Students work intensively on a special topic in mathematics or its applications. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered periodically.
name: Top: Intro Abstract Math
notes: Not open to students who have taken Math 244 or Math 252.

title: Topics in Mathematics
